snippet: Nick Kyrgios has the weapons to beat Andy Murray in their Wimbledon fourth-round clash on Monday but must play the match on his own terms, according to former champion Lleyton Hewitt....
lead_paragraph: Nick Kyrgios has the weapons to beat Andy Murray in their Wimbledon fourth-round clash on Monday but must play the match on his own terms, according to former champion Lleyton Hewitt.

headline.print_headline: Kyrgios Must Avoid Physical Battle Against Murray: Hewitt
headline.main: Kyrgios Must Avoid Physical Battle Against Murray: Hewitt
